/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11     -pthread -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/home/mzhou/mylib/openmpi/lib -Wl,--enable-new-dtags -L/home/mzhou/mylib/openmpi/lib -lmpi_cxx -lmpi -lopen-rte -lopen-pal -lutil -lnsl -ldl -lmca_common_sm -lvt -Wl,--export-dynamic -L lib CMakeFiles/scrub.dir/hw1.cpp.o  -o scrub  -L/home/mzhou/mylib/openmpi/lib  -L/stage/lib -rdynamic -lglog -Wl,-rpath,/home/mzhou/mylib/openmpi/lib:/stage/lib
